text: Mrs. Jones Entertains is a 1909 American silent comedy movie directed by D. W. GriffithMrs. Jones EntertainsBernard A. Drew. Motion Picture Series and Sequels: A Reference Guide and stars John R. Cumpson, Florence Lawrence, and Jeanie MacPherson. ==Actors== * John R. Cumpson as Mr. Jones * Florence Lawrence as Mrs. Jones * Jeanie MacPherson as The Maid * Linda Arvidson * Flora Finch as A Guest * Anthony O'Sullivan * Mary Pickford as Dorothy Nicholson * Mack Sennett * Harry Solter as Delivery Man ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 movies Category:1900s comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Mrs. Jones Entertains
